The BiocPkgTools package provides utility functions for getting
information from the Bioconductor project. There is a focus on 
providing data in tidy formats to facilitate data mashups
and analysis. Functionality includes access to :

- Download statistics
- General package listing
- Build reports
- Vignettes

```{r init, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

## Build reports

```{r}
library(BiocPkgTools)
head(bioc_build_report())
```

## Download statistics

```{r}
head(getBiocDownloadStats())
```

## Package details

```{r}
require(dplyr)
bpi = getBiocPkgList()
bpi %>% 
  filter(Package=="GEOquery") %>%
  pull(importsMe)
```
